instruction: Reorder the sentences to create a cohesive story from the given set of sentences.
input: Sentences: 1. The old woman was content with her life. 2. She was able to relax more with the help of her grandchild. 3. There was an old woman who lived in a small village. 4. She was now able to take care of herself and enjoy the moments she had with her grandchild.
output: 3. There was an old woman who lived in a small village. 1. The old woman was content with her life. 2. She was able to relax more with the help of her grandchild. 4. She was now able to take care of herself and enjoy the moments she had with her grandchild.
